techmeme.title: M^0, a decentralized stablecoin minting protocol, raised a $35M Series A led by Bain Capital Crypto; the round was structured as equity plus tokens (Yogita Khatri/The Block)
Google is acquiring software virtualization company Cameyo to deeply integrate virtualized Windows app support into ChromeOS, after a partnership in April 2023 (Tom Warren/The Verge)
Asana unveils "AI teammates", a new feature in beta for select customers to help manage projects and tasks, ahead of general availability later in 2024 (Harry McCracken/Fast Company)
The UK's Competition Appeal Tribunal rules that a class action lawsuit against Google over allegations of abusing its dominance in digital ads can proceed (Upmanyu Trivedi/Bloomberg)
Tobiko, which offers a dbt-compatible data transformation service to help teams manage data, raised a $4.5M seed and $17.3M Series A led by Theory Ventures (Frederic Lardinois/TechCrunch)
